TopicTitle: Please help, i think a mod is destroying my KSP

Articles.Content: I have a Mod called Restock, and after i got it my game has been WAYYYY glitchy. I can't decouple anything, i cant go EVA. Everytime i EVA or Decouple, most of the ship Exploads. I also cannot Undock without getting Flung out of orbit. Has anyone else had this problem, if so, do you have Restock, or is it just stock KSP being Glitchy?

Why not remove Restock and see if things improve?  First step in mod troubleshooting : remove recently installed mods then try them one-by-one.

Then check you have the correct version of all mods for your version of KSP. And for more help, posting of log files generally assists others assist you.

If you do find an issue with a particular mod, heading to that mod's release thread (and reading it) is the next step - often issues have already been reported and there are hints on how to deal with them.
